title: What would happen if Wakanda no longer had resources like Adamantium? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, Wakanda doesn’t have Adamantium. It has Vibranium. Adamantium is an artificially created metal. It doesn’t occur naturally. And at this point in Wakanda’s history, they could probably survive as a knowledge economy. Exporting and marketing technology to make money. They most likely have also build-up enough of a cash reserve which they can use to invest in: Stocks.Bonds.Mutual funds.Index funds.Exchange-traded funds.Options.They have many options besides exporting Vibranium.
